title:
Unimodularity and invariant volume forms for Hamiltonian dynamics on
  coisotropic Poisson homogeneous spaces
authors:
Ivan Gutierrez-Sagredo, David Iglesias Ponte, Juan Carlos Marrero and
  Edith Padr\'on
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce the notion of a multiplicative unimodularity for
a coisotropic Poisson homogeneous space. Then, we discuss the unimodularity and
the multiplicative unimodularity for these spaces and the existence of an
invariant volume form for explicit Hamiltonian systems on such spaces. Several
interesting examples illustrating the theoretical results are also presented.
